title: Fire: what makes it burn?
creator_credit: James Bishop and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
brief_description: Uses simple laboratory demonstrations to show the factors involved in combustion, and that different materials require various degrees of heat for ignition. Emphasises the dangers of fire and illustrates safety measures.
description: Uses simple laboratory demonstrations to show the factors involved in combustion, and that different materials require various degrees of heat for ignition. Emphasises the dangers of fire and illustrates safety measures.
